verbose_text: Hypericin PDT also should be enhanced via deeper penetration of 593 nm light as in our in vitro studies above or by using longer wavelengths of pulsed infrared light for 2-photon excitation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PDT also should be enhanced via deeper penetration of 593 nm light as in our in vitro studies above or by using longer wavelengths of pulsed infrared light
